mapper.select: select * from SYLLABUS where SYL_CD = #{SYL_CD} and seme_cd = '202202'

select a.subj_cd, a.subj_name,c.name,b.syl_cd,b.APPLY_DATE, comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',a.lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,b.max_stu_num, a.credit,comm_cd_func('applyStatusCd',b.apply_status_cd) as apply_status_cd from lec_manage a,syllabus b,prof c where a.subj_cd=b.subj_cd and b.prof_id =c.prof_cd and prof_id = #{profId} and seme_cd = '202202' order by apply_date desc
select count(*) from SYLLABUS where prof_id = #{profId} and seme_cd = '202202'
select substr(SYL_CD,4)+1 from syllabus where rownum = 1 order by SYL_CD desc

select a.subj_cd, a.subj_name,c.name,b.syl_cd, comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',a.lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,b.max_stu_num, a.credit,comm_cd_func('applyStatusCd',b.apply_status_cd) as apply_status_cd from lec_manage a,syllabus b,prof c where a.subj_cd=b.subj_cd and b.prof_id =c.prof_cd

select count(*) from (select a.subj_cd, a.subj_name,c.name,b.syl_cd, comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',a.lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,b.max_stu_num, a.credit,comm_cd_func('applyStatusCd',b.apply_status_cd) as apply_status_cd from lec_manage a,syllabus b,prof c where a.subj_cd=b.subj_cd and b.prof_id =c.prof_cd )

select b.syl_cd,b.classroom,a.subj_cd,comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',a.lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,comm_cd_func('targetGrade',a.target_grade) as target_grade,a.credit, b.max_stu_num,b.lec_hour,b.materials,comm_cd_func('geCd',a.ge_cd) as ge_cd, c.mid_ratio,c.final_ratio,c.assign_ratio,c.attend_ratio,b.rej_reason, comm_cd_func('evalClassCd',b.eval_class_cd) as eval_class_cd,b.lec_date_1,b.lec_date_2, b.outline from lec_manage a,syllabus b,marks_std c where a.subj_cd = b.subj_cd and b.syl_cd = c.syl_cd and b.syl_cd=#{sylCd}
mapper.insert: insert into syllabus (SYL_CD, MAX_STU_NUM, APPLY_STATUS_CD, APPLY_DATE, APPROVE_DATE, PROF_ID, SUBJ_CD, OUTLINE, LEC_HOUR, MATERIALS, REJ_REASON, EVAL_CLASS_CD, LEC_DATE_1, LEC_DATE_2, CLASSROOM, SEME_CD) values(#{sylCd},#{maxStuNum},#{applyStatusCd},sysdate,#{approveDate},#{profId},#{subjCd},#{outline},#{lecHour},#{materials},#{rejReason},#{evalClassCd},#{lecDate1},#{lecDate2},#{classroom},#{semeCd})
